LanguageData.ForsakenScenario.label: Forsaken - Unshackled
LanguageData.ForsakenScenario.description: With the defeat of the Lich King came free will to many of his undead servants. Your group has managed to break free of his lingering grasp and you now wander the world in search of a new place to call home. However, you didn't expect to have travelled this far to find it.
LanguageData.ForsakenScenario.scenario.name: Forsaken - Unshackled
LanguageData.ForsakenScenario.scenario.summary: Undead humans and elves seeking purpose after regaining free will.

LanguageData.ForsakenScenario.scenario.parts.9.text: Undead humans and elves seeking purpose after regaining free will.
